sentence.Network_en: We expect the transgressor to make any atonement possible to him.

sentence.Network_cn: “我深信,”西丝又重说一遍,“这是你能做的唯一的赎罪的办法. ”

sentence.Network_en: As he is the first transgressor, he sees no hopes of pardon.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于他是第一个犯法者, 他看不到被豁免的希望.

entry.def: A transgressor is someone who has broken a particular rule or law or has done something that is generally considered unacceptable.

means.word_mean: 1. someone who transgresses; someone who violates a law or command;

auth_sentence.content: It is also clear that the impeachment process was not meant to punish a transgressor.
